Reviews.Title: Will not suport LTE speed on US T-Mobile carrier
Reviews.Author: sADASDAS
Reviews.Content: RM892 is an international version. RM892 does not support LTE band 4 (T-Mobile USA) per Nokia's developer page. Nokia's website lists the US variant as RM893.

Reviews.Title: Complaint
Reviews.Author: Shyam Nadkarni
Reviews.Content: The unit shipped does not appear to be new, plus it was made for Hong Kong Market with all litrature in Chinese. Additionally, the chrager sent was Hong Kong electrical outlet.  They compensated that with converter adapter to Match US and supposedly to connect with Hong Kong electrical outlet.  The two do not mate.  In addition, the model RM 892 does not appear any where on the unit, the Nokia 925 container or in the litrature.All of these issues were communicated to the vendor via e-mail and to this date none have been resolved.

Reviews.Title: best phone in the market
Reviews.Author: Jose Antonio
Reviews.Content: light, fast, always, connected, easy to use, sofistacated,  its the best phone in the market up to today.recomended to everyone

Reviews.Title: Great hardware - ok Software - Avoid this vendor as they are not US phones
Reviews.Author: raoouul
Reviews.Content: The phone itself is absoultely fantastic. It is light, great screen, great to look at!Windows 8 is a work in progres -  as soon as WIndows Blue is rolled out, it'll be at par with the iphones and ANdroidsComplaints:The unit box etc appeared to be used. It was not sealedThe unit is from Hong Kong/Singapore/Malaysia regionNot sure if factory unlocked - or unlocked after the fact. Will find out when Windows Software update rolls out later this month

Reviews.Title: Unsatisfactory
Reviews.Author: Roman Rammler
Reviews.Content: This was a US purchase order. The phone was delivered with Chinese user manual (should have been English) and an add-on adapter to the Hong-Kong AC plug (should have been US plug). Pre-configuration was Chinese.

Reviews.Title: First Windows Phone
Reviews.Author: Gautam Ganguly "online shopper"
Reviews.Content: It is a beautiful phone with excellent images and super photos and video.I cannot see videos online as Adobe does not have a compatible flash player??The battery does not last long. Not sure how to turn off applications after using them - do they continue to use energy?No apps for facebook or linkedin. My google mail has not synced yetStay with Samsung till windows catches up.

Reviews.Title: lumia
Reviews.Author: Optionmafia
Reviews.Content: The phone is exelent. Works great. Battery long lasting.No problems, very simple to use. Windows are reliable.Best phone for good price.

ProductInfo.Name: NOKIA LUMIA 925 GREY 16GB RM-892 FACTORY UNLOCKED LTE 4G 3G 2G (2G & 3G HSDPA 850/900/1900/2100 & 4G 800/900/1800/1900/2100/2600)
